item.description:
Hello R9R-ers!

It's 2013 and it's time to get the Route 9 Ruby Group back into action.  Our next meetup is going to be Wednesday, Feb 20 @ 5:30PM at Punchbowl.com's office in Framingham.  As usual, food and beer will be provided.

Project Night

This meetup will be our first project night.  Everyone is welcome to participate, from newcomer to expert.  I encourage those who have a project they need help with or have something specific in mind that they want to hack on to please leave a comment in the RSVP questionnaire.  That will help me better coordinate the event.  Also, please plan to bring your laptop if you have one.

Lightning Talks

We'll make some time for anyone who would like to do a quick lightning talk.  Lightning talks are generally 5-10min, one slide or web page (if anything), and shouldn't require much preparation.  Just stand up, riff about your favorite new shiny thing, and let the conversation flow.  Let me know in the RSVP questionnaire or when you arrive if you're interested in presenting so we can plan our time.
item.name: Feb 2013 Route 9 Ruby: Project Night
